profileAlternative.name: Addy Osmani
profileAlternative.headline: Engineering Manager at Google
profileAlternative.summary: Addy Osmani is an Engineering Manager working on Google Chrome. He leads up a Speed team focused on making the web fast. His team work on web standards, tooling (Lighthouse, Workbox), libraries and best practices for improving user experiences.

aboutAlternative.text: Addy Osmani is an Engineering Manager working on Google Chrome. He leads up a Speed team focused on making the web fast. His team work on web standards, tooling (Lighthouse, Workbox), libraries and best practices for improving user experiences.

positions.title: Google
positions.description: Engineering manager for working on Chrome & Web at Google. I am the Technical Lead for Speed and manage our teams working on open-source libraries, tooling and framework outreach. My work involves helping improve how quickly Chrome loads pages, shaping APIs, and defining best practices to help large sites deliver great user experiences.

positions.title:
Title
Senior Staff Software Engineer (Manager)
positions.description: Engineering manager for working on Chrome & Web at Google. I am the Technical Lead for Speed and manage our teams working on open-source libraries, tooling and framework outreach. My work involves helping improve how quickly Chrome loads pages, shaping APIs, and defining best practices to help large sites deliver great user experiences.

positions.title:
Title
Staff Developer Programs Engineer
positions.description: Technical Lead and manager for a team in Chrome focused on improving speed and user-experience on the web. Our teams focus on a combination of standards, tooling and library projects for reducing the friction for building success on the web.

positions.title: Owner and Author
positions.description: Between my Medium channel and personal site, the canonical technical articles I author have been viewed more than 8M times in the last few years. I focus on taking complex topics related to Web Performance or the Web Platform and try to distill them down to the core piece of insight that might help others.

positions.title: jQuery Bug Triage Team & API Docs Team Member
Senior Project Manager & Senior Web Developer
Senior Web Developer (JavaScript)
positions.description: Senior Web Developer, primarily responsible for the development of Flash and JavaScript based Product Browsing and Visualization Solutions. Responsibilities also included creating PHP based server-side solutions, graphic design and SEO implementation.

positions.title: Senior Software and Web Engineer
positions.description: This section will detail my previous experience once I get some more free time to update. Covers consultancy across large-scale developers projects requiring JavaScript, jQuery, PHP and other front and back-end technologies. For complete details, please request a copy of my resume.

given.text:
Addy is a extremely skilled interface developer who knows everything there is to know about javaScript. He still possesses the ability to combine 1,000 tasks and other projects and still manages to complete everything within schedule! Besides an incredible hard worker (when does he sleep ?!), Addy is also a friendly and outgoing guy who likes to socialise and is always prepared to lend a hand when asked. He is the guy businesses would kill to hire!
…
See more

received.text: Bart is a highly skilled software engineer with one of the best work ethics I've ever seem in a team member. Self-driven, always willing to put in the effort needed to get a project online and out the door and never hesitating to take the time out to assist other members of his team. With a solid knowledge in many important areas I think any company would be lucky to have him.
